title: Can't sign up PBE account
body: I got accepted by Riot as PBE member. But I can't make PBE account. Anybody help me please !!

replies.body: For the moment [**PBE signups**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) are closed. We're working on making the whole process a little smoother for you guys, but I don't have an ETA on when they will be open again
